mapper.update:
update repos
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PATH = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVN_PATH = #{svnPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVN_USER = #{svnUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVN_PWD = #{svnPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INFO = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MENU = #{menu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PWD = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OWNER = #{owner,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update repos set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PATH = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVN_PATH = #{svnPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVN_USER = #{svnUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVN_PWD = #{svnPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFO = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENU = #{menu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PWD = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNER = #{owner,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select:
select
from repos where ID IN (select REPOS_ID from repos_auth where (USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} or USER_ID = 0) and ACCESS > 0 )
